member.name: T:FoodClassLib.Food
member.summary: This class represents a food item.

member.name: P:FoodClassLib.Food.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the food item.

member.name: P:FoodClassLib.Food.InStock
member.summary: Amount of this food item in stock.

member.name: P:FoodClassLib.Food.LowLevel
member.summary: Specifies the lowest limit of this item.

member.name: M:FoodClassLib.Food.ToString
member.returns: Information about this food item as a string.
